languages.text: {n}Энрих потирает разодранные костяшки пальцев.{/n} "От блюстителей, на память. Мы не сошлись во мнениях. Они считали, что в ходе дознания после покушения на купальню Вашей Светлости им дозволено избивать и морить жаждой невинных людей. А я — что у них носы слишком прямые и зубов многовато. Мы всего лишь вежливо обменялись аргументами".

{n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих потирает разодранные костяшки пальцев.{/n} "От блюстителей, на память. Мы не сошлись во мнениях. Мы всего лишь вежливо обменялись аргументами".

languages.text: {n}Einrich frotte ses poignets écorchés.{/n} « Un petit souvenir des prévôts. Nous avons eu un léger désaccord, eux et moi. Ils se sont crus en droit de battre et d'affamer des innocents dans le cadre de leur enquête sur l'incident survenu dans la salle de bain de Votre Seigneurie. Et de mon côté, je trouvais leurs nez trop droits et leurs dents trop nombreuses. Nous avons donc échangé poliment nos points de vue respectifs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich frotte ses poignets écorchés.{/n} « Un petit souvenir des prévôts. Nous avons eu un léger désaccord, eux et moi. Ils se sont crus en droit de battre et d'affamer des innocents dans le cadre de leur enquête sur l'incident survenu dans la salle de bain de Votre Seigneurie. Et de mon côté, je trouvais leurs nez trop droits et leurs dents trop nombreuses. Nous avons donc échangé poliment nos points de vue respectifs. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich se frota los nudillos raspados.{/n} «Un recuerdo de los guardias. Hemos tenido una pequeña desavenencia. Ellos pensaban que tenían derecho a agredir y dejar sin comer a gente inocente mientras investigaban el incidente de los baños de mil{mf|ord|ady}, y yo pensaba que sus narices estaban muy rectas y que les sobraban dientes. Estuvimos un rato intercambiando opiniones».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."

Estuvimos un rato intercambiando opiniones».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは拳をこすりつけた。{/n} 「エンフォーサーを思い出すための、ちょっとした贈り物を。私たちにはちょっとした意見の衝突がありました。彼らは陛下の浴室での事件を調査している間、罪のない人々を殴り、飢えさせる権利があるのだと思っていました。私は彼らの鼻はまっすぐすぎて、歯が多すぎると思いました。だから、丁重に意見の交換をしたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは拳をこすりつけた。{/n} 「エンフォーサーを思い出すための、ちょっとした贈り物を。私たちにはちょっとした意見の衝突がありました。彼らは陛下の浴室での事件を調査している間、罪のない人々を殴り、飢えさせる権利があるのだと思っていました。私は彼らの鼻はまっすぐすぎて、歯が多すぎると思いました。だから、丁重に意見の交換をしたのです」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇揉了揉擦伤的指关节。{/n} “不过是件小小的礼物，是执法者送给我的。我们之前发生了一点点小小的分歧，他们认为在调查舰长大人浴室的事故期间，他们有权殴打无辜的人，不给普通人饭吃，而我认为那些执法者鼻子太挺，牙齿也太多，于是我们礼貌地交换了意见。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇揉了揉擦伤的指关节。{/n} “不过是件小小的礼物，是执法者送给我的。我们之前发生了一点点小小的分歧，他们认为在调查舰长大人浴室的事故期间，他们有权殴打无辜的人，不给普通人饭吃，而我认为那些执法者鼻子太挺，牙齿也太多，于是我们礼貌地交换了意见。”

languages.text: {n}Einrich reibt sich seine abgeschürften Knöchel{/n} "Ein kleines Geschenk, das mich an die Enforcer zu erinnert. Wir hatten eine kleine Meinungsverschiedenheit. Sie dachten, sie hätten das Recht, im Rahmen der Untersuchung des Zwischenfalls im Bad Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} unschuldige Leute zu verprügeln und um ihre Rationen zu bringen. Ich hielt ihre Nasen für zu gerade und sie hatten zu viele Zähne. Also haben wir höflich unsere Meinungen ausgetauscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."

Sie dachten, sie hätten das Recht, im Rahmen der Untersuchung des Zwischenfalls im Bad Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} unschuldige Leute zu verprügeln und um ihre Rationen zu bringen. Ich hielt ihre Nasen für zu gerade und sie hatten zu viele Zähne. Also haben wir höflich unsere Meinungen ausgetauscht."

languages.text: {n}Einrich, sıyrılmış el kemiklerini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "İnfazcıları hatırlatacak ufak bir hediye. Önemsiz bir anlaşmazlık yaşadık. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin hamamındaki hadiseyi incelediğim esnada masum insanları dövüp aç bırakmaya hakları olduğunu düşünmüşler. Burunları gözüme çok düz geldi, bir de o kadar çok dişe ihtiyaçları yoktu. Yani kibarca fikirlerimizi paylaştık."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rubs his grazed knuckles.{/n} "A little gift to remember the enforcers by. We've had a small disagreement. They thought they had the right to beat and starve innocent people while investigating the incident in Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s bathchamber. I thought their noses were too straight and they had too many teeth. So, we politely exchanged opinions."
